sqlMap.select: select * FROM _fina_jobs t WHERE $qry$ AND jobtype = 'E' AND $icare$ AND isdelete = FALSE ORDER BY jobdate desc
select count(*) AS counts FROM _fina_jobs t WHERE $qry$ AND $icare$ AND jobtype = 'E'
select * FROM _bus_ship_container t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = false
select count(*) AS counts FROM _bus_ship_container t WHERE $qry$
